programme.title: Marci X (2003)
programme.desc: Lackluster comedy in which a spoiled socialite (Lisa Kudrow) tries to reform a notorious rapper (Damon Wayans) after his songs trigger a boycott of her father's record label. Directed by Richard Benjamin, who also stars as Kudrow's record-exec father(n)

programme.title: Wonderland (2017)
programme.desc: A 12-year-old girl's mother is a gambling addict(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys (1983)
programme.desc: Brutal portrait of teen criminals in and out of a reformatory. Sean Penn, Reni Santoni. Gene: Jim Moody. Horowitz: Eric Gurry. Paco: Esai Morales. J.C.: Ally Sheedy(n)

programme.title: Unfriended: Dark Web (2018)
programme.desc: A group of teenagers agree to play games online, but are soon terrorised by mysterious hackers that want a newly-purchased laptop back. As the teenagers begin to investigate the mysterious contents of the laptop, the hackers take it upon themselves to get the laptop back by force(n)

programme.title: Black Swan (2010)
programme.desc: Ballet dancer Nina (Natalie Portman) experiences traumatic hallucinations as she pushes her body to the limit in order to win the lead role in a production of "Swan Lake." Meanwhile, she must also deal with competition from a rival dancer and the sexual advances of the ballet company's director(n)

programme.title: Beyond Borders (2003)
programme.desc: A married socialite (Angelina Jolie) leaves a pampered life in England to join a relief group run by a renegade doctor (Clive Owen). Good intentions are sunk by a sappy romance. Noah Emmerich, Teri Polo, Linus Roache. Directed by Martin Campbell(n)

programme.title: Blindspotting (2018)
programme.desc: A black ex-con trying to finish out his year-long probation witnesses a brutal police shooting; an incident that begins to haunt him and ultimately forces him to re-examine his relationship with his white best friend, a man who is known to be reckless and ill-tempered(n)

programme.title: Paycheck (2003)
programme.desc: In a futuristic but familiar world, a high-tech engineer whose memory has been partially erased must use a group of unrelated objects to discover the truth about his previous identity(n)

programme.title: Stakeout (1987)
programme.desc: Two Seattle detectives are assigned to watch the home of a woman in case her old boyfriend, who has just escaped from prison, shows up. At first, the detectives are bored and frustrated by the job, but meeting the object of the surveillance changes everything(n)

programme.title: Scary Movie 3 (2003)
programme.desc: This parody sequel spoofs "Signs," "The Ring," "The Matrix Reloaded," "The Others," "The Sixth Sense" and "8 Mile." David Zucker ("Airplane!") directed(n)

programme.title: The Ringer (2005)
programme.desc: A loser with money problems pretends to be mentally challenged to rig the Special Olympics(n)

programme.desc: Frustrated with the lack of progress by the local police in finding those responsible for the brutal murder of her daughter, a mother installs three controversial billboards on the edge of town to goad the department into action(n)

programme.title: Smilla's Sense of Snow (1997)
programme.desc: Thriller about a half-Inuit scientist (Julia Ormond) who becomes obsessed with the suspicious death of an Eskimo boy in Copenhagen. Gabriel Byrne. Tork: Richard Harris. Moritz: Robert Loggia. Elsa: Vanessa Redgrave. Based on the novel by Peter Hoeg. Directed by Bille August(n)

programme.title: Smilla's Sense of Snow (1997)
programme.desc: Thriller about a half-Inuit scientist (Julia Ormond) who becomes obsessed with the suspicious death of an Eskimo boy in Copenhagen. Gabriel Byrne. Tork: Richard Harris. Moritz: Robert Loggia. Elsa: Vanessa Redgrave. Based on the novel by Peter Hoeg. Directed by Bille August(n)

programme.title: The Jackal (1997)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis is the eponymous assassin hired by a Russian Mafia boss to kill the head of the FBI in revenge for his brother's death. Sidney Poitier, deputy Fbi chief, gets wind of the plot but nobody knows what The Jackal looks like or when or where he plans to strike - only ex-IRA terrorist Richard Gere can help but can he be trusted? Michael Caton-Jones' thriller racks up the tension as it follows the parallel paths of the hunter and the assassin with the clock ticking down in this re-make of The Day of the Jackal(n)

programme.title: Toenail (2016)
programme.desc: An ambitious yuppie must care for his ailing father on the eve of a big promotion(n)

programme.title: Corky Romano (2001)
programme.desc: A bumbling veterinarian joins the FBI so he can destroy evidence against his mob-boss father(n)

programme.title: The Nutty Professor (1996)
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as Professor Sherman, 450lb of scientist who falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty. But, out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested on hamsters and - hey presto - he becomes svelte, cool-talking babe-magnet Buddy Love. Unfortunately, the serum can wear off at the most embarrassing moments, as Tom Shadyac's film fully exploits for sight gags, but there is also an underlying message about judging by appearances in this comedy romance(n)

programme.title: Flirting with Disaster (1996)
programme.desc: Hilarious social satire focusing on the wacky efforts of an adopted man (Ben Stiller) to find his biological parents. Patricia Arquette. Tina: Tea Leoni. Written and directed by David O. Russell(n)

programme.title: Analyze This (1999)
programme.desc: An anxiety-ridden New York crime boss forces a beleaguered psychiatrist to treat him, summoning the doctor for his professional help at all hours and in all places, even including the doc's Florida wedding to a TV reporter(n)

programme.title: The Darjeeling Limited (2007)
programme.desc: Wes Anderson's comedy stars Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody and Jason Schwartzman as brothers Francis, Peter and Jack Whitman, who, once close, haven't spoken to each other since their father's funeral a year ago. But when Francis survives a bad motorcycle crash, he is inspired to ask his siblings to join him on a train journey across India on The Darjeeling Limited train to visit their mother who lives in a convent on the foothills of the Himalayas. However, the trio ate thrown off the train after a misunderstanding involving pepper spray, and encounter cobras, crocodiles and a village funeral. But in the course of their adventures, they learn to shed their emotional luggage (symbolised by the Louis Vuitton cases they lug around) in order to re-establish a family bond again(n)

programme.title: Bruce Almighty (2003)
programme.desc: God gives a disgruntled TV reporter divine powers to show him how difficult it is to run the world(n)

programme.title: Red Sparrow (2018)
programme.desc: After suffering a career-ending injury, a ballerina and her mother are facing a bleak and uncertain future. That is why she finds herself manipulated into becoming the newest recruit for Sparrow School, a secret intelligence service that trains exceptional young people like her to use their bodies and minds as weapons(n)

programme.title: Elektra (2005)
programme.desc: Rob Bowman's fantasy thriller stars Jennifer Garner as Elektra, an assassin tutored by the mysterious martial arts master Stick. Her latest assignment is to keep Mark Miller and his daughter Abby safe from the ninja warriors of the evil Order of the Hand, to whom she once paid allegiance. Now that she is on the side of good, her task is to protect those who can tip the balance between good and evil, but can she overcome her once-fellow assassins?(n)

programme.title: Disclosure (1994)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas is the victim of sexual harassment at the hands of his new boss in this adaptation of Michael Crichton's bestseller about corporate power-playing(n)

programme.title: RoboCop 3 (1993)
programme.desc: The cyborg defends impoverished Detroit citizens whose homes are threatened by an evil corporation formed by his creators, who have gone corrupt(n)

programme.title: The Warrior's Way (2010)
programme.desc: A legendary Asian swordsman (Jang Dong-gun) must fight for his life after giving up his warrior ways and hiding out in the American badlands in this Western-martial-arts hybrid(n)

programme.title: Bad Girls (1994)
programme.desc: Four Old West prostitutes must flee their brothel after one of them murders a colonel who tried to rape a fellow working girl. Later, the women reinvent themselves as gunslinging vigilantes(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
programme.desc: Concluding part of the time-travelling trilogy. Marty McFly travels to the American Wild West of 1885 in a desperate bid to save Doc Brown from becoming another victim of the black-hatted varmint gunslinger Buford Tannen. A dazzling mix of special effects and rip-roaring comedy(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse (2004)
programme.desc: The lovely Milla Jovovich is back with a vengeance as amnesiac, genetically-altered zombie killer, Alice, in this sequel to the 2002 hit film, which is based on the video game. This time around the sinister Umbrella Corporation sends a team of investigators into their destroyed underground lab (the ground-zero of carnage in the previous film) and unwittingly unleash the still-staggering zombies and monsters out into the population of Raccoon City(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled (1971)
programme.desc: Offbeat western drama in which a wounded Yankee soldier finds refuge in an isolated southern girls' school towards the end of the American Civil War. The strange visitor soon becomes the object of the young women's romantic fantasies, transforming the school into a hotbed of jealousy and sexual frustration. His manipulation of the situation results in a startling, violent conclusion to this unusual drama(n)

programme.title: Mobsters (1991)
programme.desc: New York City in the 1920s provides a perfect environment for the rise of mobsters Lucky Luciano, Bugsy Siegel, Meyer Lansky and Frank Costello. The foursome fights to take the city's crime syndicate over from its aging controllers(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049 (2017)
programme.desc: In 2049 L.A., a cop known as K hunts down android labourers who have gone rogue. But when he uncovers a shocking conspiracy involving the robots, K searches for the one person who might have answers: a law-enforcement agent who once had his job(n)

programme.title: Justice League (2017)
programme.desc: In the wake of Superman's death, Batman and Wonder Woman recruit superpowered individuals to defend humanity from an otherworldly threat called Steppenwolf. Together with their new allies—Cyborg, Aquaman and the Flash—they form the Justice League(n)

programme.title: Red Sparrow (2018)
programme.desc: After suffering a career-ending injury, a ballerina and her mother are facing a bleak and uncertain future. That is why she finds herself manipulated into becoming the newest recruit for Sparrow School, a secret intelligence service that trains exceptional young people like her to use their bodies and minds as weapons(n)

programme.title: The Mother (2003)
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a 60-something widow pursues a relationship with the much younger married boyfriend of her daughter(n)

programme.title: The Mother (2003)
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a 60-something widow pursues a relationship with the much younger married boyfriend of her daughter(n)

programme.title: Victoria and Abdul (2017)
programme.desc: Queen Victoria forges an unlikely bond with an Indian clerk who traveled to London for her Golden Jubilee. The pair eventually become lifelong friends, although the Queen's inner circle are horrified by their relationship(n)

programme.title: The Lonely Guy (1984)
programme.desc: An aspiring novelist deals with lonesomeness after being dumped by his girlfriend. He meets a subculture of lonely, heartbroken men, and eventually writes about his experiences(n)

programme.title: Bruce Lee, the Legend (1984)
programme.desc: A documentary that follows the story of the legendary martial arts icon Bruce Lee. It elaborates on his journey from Hong Kong to America and back again, right up to his tragic death at the age of 32. It also talks about how the movie star faked his own eath to find the people trying to kill him(n)

programme.title: Game of Death (1978)
programme.desc: Story about a Hong Kong crime syndicate, with Bruce Lee footage from an unfinished 1973 film. Gig Young, Dean Jagger, Hugh O'Brian, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar. Ann: Colleen Camp. Carl: Robert Wall. Stick: Mel Novak. Fighter: Chuck Norris. Pasqual: Danny Inosanto(n)

programme.title: Scary Movie 3 (2003)
programme.desc: This parody sequel spoofs "Signs," "The Ring," "The Matrix Reloaded," "The Others," "The Sixth Sense" and "8 Mile." David Zucker ("Airplane!") directed(n)

programme.title: Lady Macbeth (2016)
programme.desc: In 1865 England, a young woman in a loveless marriage has an affair with a servant on her estate. When her husband and father-in-law discover their tryst, the lovers resort to deception and murder in order to save their relationship(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich (1999)
programme.desc: Craig Schwartz (John Cusak) is hard-up financially and ends up accepting a job as a file clerk in a mediocre company on the 7th floor in the center of a building. One day, behind some filing cabinets, he finds a corridor that leads into the mind of actor John Malkovich (played by himself). Amazed at the discovery, the frustrated clerk tries to talk his workmate, Maxine (Catherine Keener), into making some money by charging a fee to whoever wants to be John Malkovich by spending fifteen minutes inside the actor's head. The film was directed by the renowned video-clip director, Spike Jonze, and features also the performance of Cameron Diaz -completely transformed to play Craig's wife. Being John Malkovich obtained three Oscar® nominations, for best director, best original screenplay, and best supporting actress (Catherine Keener), and four Golden Globe nominations - best film, best screenplay, best supporting actress (Catherine Keener and Cameron Diaz)(n)

programme.title: Head in the Clouds (2004)
programme.desc: A free spirit (Charlize Theron) woos both a student (Stuart Townsend) and a model (Penelope Cruz) in WWII Europe. A sluggish, unnecessarily complex historical romance. John Duigan directed. Thomas Kretschmann and Steven Berkoff costar(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky (2001)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise plays a thirtysomething heir to a publishing fortune who finds his life turned upside down after a car accident. Julie: Cameron Diaz. Sofia: Penelope Cruz. McCabe: Kurt Russell. Brian: Jason Lee. Ventura: Noah Taylor. Tipp: Timothy Spall. Directed by Cameron Crowe. A remake of 1997's “Abre los ojos,” which also starred Cruz. Paul McCartney's title song was nominated for an Oscar(n)

programme.title: K-9: P.I. (2002)
programme.desc: In the third outing of the series, Det. Dooley (James Belushi) and his canine partner retire from the force and go into the private-eye business. Kim Huffman, Barbara Tyson, Gary Basaraba(n)

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us (2017)
programme.desc: Two strangers embark on a dangerous trek to safety after their chartered flight crashes on a remote snowy mountain in Utah. Along the way, the pair begin to develop feelings for each other as they try to stay alive and get back to civilization(n)

programme.title: The 33 (2015)
programme.desc: Based on a true event, the film follows the 2010 mining disaster incident where a group of thirty-three miners were trapped inside the San Jose mine in Chile for more than two months after a gold and copper mine collapses(n)

programme.title: Legend (2015)
programme.desc: This thriller follows the rise and fall of Ronald and Reginald Kray, identical twin gangsters who built a criminal empire in London during the 1950s and '60s using gruesome, unhinged tactics and savvy business acumen(n)

programme.title: The Big Boss (1971)
programme.desc: A worker who has sworn off violence defends his colleagues against their drug-smuggling, murderous employers(n)

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard (2017)
programme.desc: A professional bodyguard must protect his longtime nemesis, a ruthless hit man, after the latter agrees to testify at the Hague against a dictator. The bickering pair team up to defeat the dictator's henchmen as they embark on a journey across Europe(n)

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels (2010)
programme.desc: A mail-room worker finds himself on the adventure of a lifetime after being shipwrecked on a fantastical island inhabited by a minuscule race of people, who make him look like a giant by comparison, in this modern take on the classic tale by Jonathan Swift(n)

programme.title: Arizona (2018)
programme.desc: During the housing crisis in 2009, an Arizona realtor named Cassie is confronted by a murderous former client whom she convinced to mortgage an overpriced McMansion. Hellbent on making people pay for his unhappiness, he kidnaps Cassie and her daughter and ropes them into his frantic revenge fantasy(n)

programme.title: American Made (2017)
programme.desc: In this '80s-set thriller based on a true story, airline pilot Barry Seal is recruited by the CIA to smuggle drugs and weapons abroad for the U.S. government. However, Seal gets in over his head when he becomes involved with Colombia's Medellín cartel and the Iran-contra scandal(n)

programme.title: Goodfellas (1990)
programme.desc: Gangster saga explores the life of organized crime as it chronicles the true-life rise and fall of New York mobster and FBI informant Henry Hill and the more prominent "goodfellas" in his world. Henry comes up through the ranks, but quickly learns that his half-Irish, half-Sicilian ethnicity prevents him from ever becoming a "made guy." Soon he finds himself the target of both the feds and his Mafia family, who feel that he has become a threat to their security with his reckless dealings(n)

programme.title: Black Widow (1987)
programme.desc: A Justice Department statistician (Debra Winger) tries to prove that a widow (Theresa Russell) has killed her husbands for their money. Paul: Sami Frey. Ben: Dennis Hopper. William: Nicol Williamson. Bruce: Terry O'Quinn. Directed by Bob Rafelson(n)

programme.title: Black Widow (1987)
programme.desc: A Justice Department statistician (Debra Winger) tries to prove that a widow (Theresa Russell) has killed her husbands for their money. Paul: Sami Frey. Ben: Dennis Hopper. William: Nicol Williamson. Bruce: Terry O'Quinn. Directed by Bob Rafelson(n)

programme.title: Atomic Blonde (2017)
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in 1989 Berlin, MI6 agent Lorraine Broughton must obtain a stolen list of Western spies while the city around her descends into chaos and revolution. In time, her pursuit leads her to uncover a much-larger conspiracy(n)

programme.title: High Crimes (2002)
programme.desc: When her ex-Marine husband is accused of past war crimes, a lawyer enlists the help of a fellow attorney who's wrestling with his own demons(n)

programme.title: Rebound (2005)
programme.desc: Clichéd airball of a family-friendly sports fable about a disgraced college basketball coach (Martin Lawrence) who seeks redemption by mentoring a team of junior-high misfits. Wendy Raquel Robinson, Horatio Sanz. Directed by Steve Carr(n)

programme.title: Hannibal (2001)
programme.desc: Cunning Hannibal Lecter resurfaces after a decade in hiding to toy with FBI agent Clarice Starling. As Starling's career flounders, Lecter attempts to elude a greedy Italian police detective. Meanwhile, a maimed former victim of Lecter's plots revenge(n)

programme.title: The Skulls II (2002)
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder in a top-secret college fraternity, a newly inducted student discovers that his own life is in danger if he goes to the police. Robin Dunne, Lindy Booth, Aaron Ashmore, Ashley Lyn Cafagna. Directed by Joe Chappelle(n)

programme.title: Cabin Fever (2002)
programme.desc: A throwback to the horror films of the '70s, this inventive, well-crafted chiller follows a group of college friends who are threatened by a flesh-eating disease in the woods. Rider Strong, Jordan Ladd. Eli Roth directed and co-wrote the script(n)

programme.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street (2010)
programme.desc: Murdered child killer Freddy Krueger returns to claim the children of the parents who burned him alive. When Elm Street teen Nancy and her friends all begin having nightmares about Freddy, they must stay awake in order to survive, because if they die in their dreams, they die in real life. In order to defeat Freddy, the terrified friends must race to uncover the secret their parents have been hiding from them all these years(n)

programme.title: My Soul to Take (2010)
programme.desc: A serial killer returns 16 years after his death to claim the seven children born on the night he was killed. Meanwhile, the maniac's son Adam (Max Thieriot)---one of his intended victims---battles to lay his father's bloody legacy to rest(n)

programme.title: Victory (1981)
programme.desc: John Huston-coached soccer match---Allied POWs led by Michael Caine and Sylvester Stallone vs. Nazi commandant Max von Sydow's German squad---during WWII. Professional soccer greats Pele, Bobby Moore and Osvaldo Ardiles add authenticity(n)

programme.title: 127 Hours (2010)
programme.desc: Docudrama about adventurer Aron Ralston (James Franco), who was trapped in a Utah canyon for five days with his hand stuck under a boulder and eventually resorted to desperate measures in order to escape. Directed by Danny Boyle(n)

programme.title: Funny Games (2007)
programme.desc: Writer-director Michael Haneke's remake of his disturbing 1997 Austrian film is a manipulative shocker about a vacationing family whose home is invaded by two young men who subject them to a night of psychological and physical torture(n)

programme.title: Kin (2018)
programme.desc: A young boy uses an otherworldly weapon to save his older adoptive brother from a group of thugs after the latter is released from prison. Before long, the two of them are also pursued by federal agents and mysterious mercenaries aiming to reclaim their asset(n)

programme.title: RoboCop 2 (1990)
programme.desc: The armour-plated hero finds himself up against two powerful adversaries: the all-powerful corporate corruption of Omni Consumer Products, headed by the Old Man, and Cain, a towering drug dealer with plans to introduce the devastatingly powerful designer narcotic Nuke onto the market and then hold Manson-like sway over the resulting addicts. Bruising sequel in which Peter Weller returns as the metallic law enforcer, continuing his crusade against crime on the streets of Old Detroit, along with his partner Lewis(n)

programme.title: Term Life (2016)
programme.desc: A professional thief takes his estranged daughter on the lam when a job goes awry. As crooks and corrupt cops close in on them, he also takes out a life-insurance policy on himself in an effort to leave something behind for his daughter(n)

programme.title: Warning Sign (1985)
programme.desc: Thriller about an accident at a biological-warfare lab and the workers who become genetic zombies. Sam Waterston, Kathleen Quinlan. Connolly: Yaphet Kotto. Fairchild: Jeffrey DeMunn. Nielsen: Richard Dysart. Schmidt: G.W. Bailey. Vic: Jerry Hardin. Hal Barwood directed(n)

programme.title: American Animals (2018)
programme.desc: Four bright and well-off college students in Kentucky plot to steal some rare books from their university's Special Collections Library in a misguided quest for personal glory. Based on a true story, the film includes interviews with the foursome who attempted the bizarre heist(n)

programme.title: The Newton Boys (1998)
programme.desc: A biopic about the Newton brothers (Matthew McConaughey, Skeet Ulrich, Vincent D'Onofrio, Ethan Hawke), who robbed more than 80 banks during the 1920s. Louise: Julianna Margulies. Brentwood Glasscock: Dwight Yoakam. Written and directed by Richard Linklater(n)

programme.title: The Snowman (2017)
programme.desc: Norwegian police detective Harry Hole hunts a terrifying adversary known as "the Snowman Killer." Hole and a rookie cop investigate cold cases in the hope of nabbing the killer, but they soon resort to more-desperate measures to catch their prey(n)

programme.title: Out of Sight (1998)
programme.desc: A career bank robber bursts out of jail with the help of his buddy and kidnaps a U.S. Marshal. At first it's all a bit much to take in, as he learns the modern world is teeming with deities and their offspring. programme.title: There's Something About Mary (1998)
programme.desc: After Dumb and Dumber and Kingpin, this was the Farrelly brothers' breakthrough movie, an all-round, laugh-out-loud comedy of bad taste, leavened by stand-out performances from a top-notch cast. Ben Stiller plays high school geek Ted, invited to the prom by the gorgeous Mary. He can hardly believe his luck; but the night goes wrong when he arrives to pick up his date, and has a painful accident in the toilet, failing to stow his tackle before zipping up. Thirteen years later Ted still yearns for what might have been and hires private eye Pat Healy to find Mary. The detective succeeds but also falls for her and feeds Ted false information so he can keep her for himself. But a suspicious Ted takes matters into his own hands and finds he's in the middle of a love pentagon also involving an architect and an NFL quarterback. Derek Thompson is an ice hockey pro whose main tactical use is the flattening of opponents - often depriving them of a tooth or two in the process. His aggression has earned him the nickname 'Tooth Fairy', but when he unsportingly tells his girlfriend's daughter that tooth fairies don't exist in reality, he's in for a bit of a shock. Unknown to him they do - and they take great umbrage at his slight. Thompson is whipped away to Fairy Land, where he's tried for his misdemeanour and sentenced to a week's community service as a tooth fairy. Thus he sprouts wings, is furnished with an outfit completely at odds with his usual image and is given Tracy as a (none too willing) mentor. And, as the comedic misunderstandings and slapstick errors steadily mount, it's clear Thompson wasn't cut out for his new line of work(n)

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz (1979)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in; Dirty Harry director Don Siegel's prison break classic, which is based on a real-life attempt to do what was supposed to be impossible: escape from Alcatraz, the notorious island penitentiary off the Californian coast. Frank Morris (Eastwood) has been transferred to Alcatraz after persistently making attempts to escape from mainland jails. Officials believe that, on The Rock, he'll cause them no further grief while serving his life sentence. But, constantly harassed by the prison warden and fellow convicts, Morris has other ideas. He shares his plans with three other prisoners - Clarence and John Anglin and Charley Butts - and together they gradually set about making their strike for freedom... The director ditches the standard prison-break flick's obsession with action for a more considered, suspenseful focus on the why and how of their bid(n)

When Hannah leaves on a business trip to Scotland, Tom is surprised to realise how truly lonely he is without her, so the moment she returns, Tom resolves to ask for her hand in marriage. But apparently Hannah's trip wasn't all business, because upon returning home Hannah announces that she has gotten engaged to a dashing Scotsman and will soon be starting a new life overseas.
